class.name: Wolf and Saint
class.description: Action Skill. Press [LB/L1/F] to summon Wolf and Saint, your trusty combat drones. Wolf will roam and attack enemies, while Saint will stay close to you and replenish your Health. Saint has a protective shield, but Wolf can be damaged by enemies. Press and hold [LB/L1/F] to recall Wolf and Saint and have some of your Cooldown refunded.

stats.name: Saint regenerates 2.5% of your Max Health / sec.

skills.name: Auxiliary Tanks
skills.description: Increases Wolf and Saint's Duration and Cooldown Rate.

skills.name: Fortify
skills.description: Increases Max Health for you and Wolf. Additionally, while Saint is active you deal increased Damage with all gun types.

skills.name: Energize
skills.description: Saint Ability. Saint will occasionally boost the Shields of you and your friends. Additionally, Saint gains an increase to the rate which he regenerates your health.

stats.name: Saint regenerates: +[$]% of your Max Health / sec.

skills.name: Heatsinks
skills.description: Improves Shield Recharge Rate and Shield Recharge Delay. This bonus is doubled while Wolf and Saint are on cooldown.

skills.name: Termination Protocols
skills.description: Fight For Your Life is replaced by Termination Protocols. During Termination Protocols you can walk at a reduced speed, fire your weapons, and you constantly shock nearby enemies. If the timer runs out, your power core goes critical, releasing a Nuclear Explosion.

stats.name: "I absolutely will not stop, ever, until you are dead."

skills.name: Rapid Reinforcement
skills.description: Kill Skill. Killing an enemy increases your Cooldown Rate for Wolf and Saint and increases your Movement Speed and Reload Speed for a short time.

skills.name: Zero Hour
skills.description: Saint Ability. When Saint is recalled or expires, he explodes, deploying a Healing Zone underneath you. You and your friends Regenerate Health while standing in the zone.

stats.name: Regenerates 8.0% of your Max Health / sec.

skills.name: Hazmat Containment System
skills.description: If you have a Incendiary, Shock, or Corrosive Status Effect on you, you and your friends gain increased Resistance to that element. Additionally, you will occasionally spread that Status Effect to nearby enemies while it's active.

skills.name: Kinetic Armor
skills.description: Increases your Maximum Health. Additionally, close range attackers have a chance to be struck by Explosive Feedback. The closer the enemy is to you the more likely he is to be struck.

skills.name: Hard To Kill
skills.description: Whenever you are shot or struck by an enemy, you gain a stack of Hard To Kill, reducing all Damage received. All stacks are removed after a few seconds of taking no damage.

skills.name: Overcharge
skills.description: Saint Ability. Immediately after being summoned, Saint will release an Energy Wave that will Overcharge you and any nearby friends for a short duration. Overcharged players gain increased Movement Speed, Fire Rate, Reload Speed, and Ammo Regeneration.

skills.name: Laser Focus
skills.description: Increases Gun Damage and Magazine Size with all Laser Weapons.

skills.name: Man and Machine
skills.description: Increases Shield Capacity and Maximum Health for you and Wolf.

skills.name: First to Fight
skills.description: Increases your Gun Damage. This bonus is lost 5 seconds after you deal damage, and is regained after 5 seconds of you not dealing or taking damage.

skills.name: Targeting Scope
skills.description: Kill Skill. Killing an enemy gives you increased Accuracy and Critical Damage for a few seconds.

skills.name: Power Fist
skills.description:
Cyborg Augmentation: Arm.
Melee Override. Press (RS/V) to perform an explosive punch with extended range. This ability has a cooldown.

stats.name: "I am now authorized to use physical force."

skills.name: Emergency Response
skills.description: Emergency Response is activated whenever your Shield becomes depleted, increasing your Fire Rate and Reload Speed, and Wolf's Fire Rate, for a short duration. Your Shield must fully recharge between activations.

skills.name: Shock Absorbers
skills.description:
Cyborg Augmentation: Legs.
You can shoot while Sprinting. While doing so, you gain bonus Gun Damage, and suffer no accuracy penalties.

skills.name: Divert Power
skills.description: When your Shields are depleted and your Health is low, taking Damage causes you to gain massive Shield Regeneration and Damage Resistance for a few seconds. This ability has a cooldown.

skills.name: Meteor Slam
skills.description: Increases the Damage Radius of your Slam ability.

skills.name: Welcome to the Gun Show
skills.description: You are better with guns in nearly every regard. Increases Gun Damage, Reload Speed, Magazine Size, Accuracy, and reduces Recoil.

skills.name: Vengeance Cannon
skills.description:
Cyborg Augmentation: Weapon.
Whenever your Shield becomes depleted, you activate your shoulder-mounted Vengeance Cannon. The Vengeance Cannon fires Incendiary Laser Blasts in tandem with your equipped weapon and lasts for a short period of time. Your Shield must fully recharge between activations.

skills.name: Afterburner
skills.description: Wolf's Air Speed is increased. Additionally, your Reload Speed and Projectile Speed is increased.

skills.name: Fire Support
skills.description: Increases your Damage with all gun types and increases the Damage dealt by Wolf.

skills.name: Venom Bolts
skills.description: Wolf Ability. Wolf's shots have a chance to be Venom Bolts, which deal Corrosive Damage. Additionally, you gain increased Corrode Chance and Corrode Damage with guns and grenades.

skills.name: Suppression
skills.description: Kill Skill. Killing an enemy gives you and Wolf increased Fire Rate for a short time.

skills.name: Laser Guided
skills.description: When you activate Wolf and Saint, or press [LB/L1/F] while they are active, Saint will Paint the target under your reticle. Wolf will focus attacks on the currently Painted target, and the target will receive increased Damage from all sources. If a target is killed while Painted, time will be added to Wolf and Saint's Duration.

stats.name: Wolf and Saint Duration on Kill: +5 seconds

skills.name: Rolling Thunder
skills.description: While Wolf is alive, you will periodically gain stacks of Rolling Thunder, increasing Wolf's Damage.

skills.name: Kill Switch
skills.description: Wolf Ability. Whenever Wolf is recalled, runs out of Health, or expires, it will dive bomb enemies with explosive effect!

skills.name: Scramble
skills.description: When Wolf is destroyed, it is replaced once for free, and time will be added to Wolf and Saint's Duration.

skills.name: Cold War
skills.description: When you apply a Shock, Incendiary, or Corrosive status effect to an enemy, there is a chance for the target to freeze. Additionally, you gain increased status effect chance when using Cryo weapons.

skills.name: Escalation
skills.description: Increases your Critical Hit Damage. Additionally, Critical Hits on enemies reduce the remaining Cooldown of Wolf and Saint by a small amount. This effect has a cooldown.

skills.name: Omega Strike
skills.description: Wolf Ability. Wolf periodically launches a deadly missile strike against its targets.

stats.name: "Too close for guns, I’m switching to missiles."
